name: Grey Leather Jockstrap - 6609895718967
description: This underwear is made to order to our exacting standards in our atelier in Paris. Please allow four to six weeks to receive your underwear order. The materials of our Leather Jockstraps were carefully selected for their unique characteristics. The leather is delicate and will age beautifully with proper care. To maintain the quality of your jockstrap, we recommend cleaning it with leather conditioner. If taken to the dry cleaner, please gently remove the leather lacing from the jockstrap to avoid any damage. Returns or size exchanges are not accepted for this item.

name: Diamond Eyelet Swim Shorts - 10146558181709
description: Introducing our newest LdSS swimwear style. These swim shorts feature an elasticated waistband with adjustable drawstrings for optimal fit and comfort, along with two side pockets and a breathable micro-mesh lining. Adorned with our iconic diamond-shaped LdSS eyelets, each pair comes in its own branded pouch  designed to protect your swimwear while traveling or after sun-drenched days. Size Guide: Size Waist * Waist Stretched * XS 68 cm 86 cm S 72 cm 90 cm M 76 cm 94 cm L 80 cm 98 cm *Measurements were not done on a model but a flat surface. For hygiene purposes we do not accept returns or exchanges for swimwear.

name: Signature Swim Briefs - 10146495955277
description: Our Signature Swim Briefs have been reimagined and refined. This updated style features adjustable drawstrings that wrap around the waist, offering an optimal fit and comfort. A breathable micro-mesh lining sits discreetly behind the iconic lace-up crotch preventing direct contact between skin and metal components. UPF 50+ sun protection helps prevent fabric damage caused by UV exposure. OEKO-TEX certification ensures the material is free from substances that could compromise health or well-being. Each pair comes in its own branded pouch  designed to protect your swimwear while traveling or after sun-drenched days. Size Guide: Size Waist * XS 69 cm S 73 cm M 77 cm L 81 cm *Measurements were not done on a model but a flat surface. For hygiene purposes we do not accept returns or exchanges for swimwear.
